data.title: Peace Frog Specialty Cleaning
data.meta_description: Visit and Find out our client satisfaction with our 5-star cleaning services.
data.meta_site_name: Peace Frog Specialty Cleaning | Carpet Cleaning Near Me | Austin
data.text:
Over 1000 5-Star Reviews

Reviews & Testimonials

Book Now

Deb S.

1719355597

I am so impressed with this LOCAL carpet cleaning company! The customer service is flawless. And, AJ did a fantastic job on the carpets! All without harsh chemicals. I will be happy to recommend Peace Frogs cleaning services!Deb Sharpton, Austin, TX

Carson H.

1718314682

Professional service and quality work. Scheduling might be a week or two out but worth the wait. We had our dryer vent and shower tile cleaned for $308. Best deal from a legit company.

Xavier B.

1717717090

100% will recommend yall to all my friends and family. Anthany was great at comunication and took a bigger work load than expected like a champ. Truly professional and well mannered and respectful the entire time.very hard worker and cleaned up and everything, left not a trace.thank youand ill see yall again later down the road.

Stephie F.

1716309068

We’ve used them in the past for carpets and were super happy with them. This time, we used them to clean patio furniture upholstery. It was super easy to schedule an appointment. They are so nice!Ryan and Anthony were our technicians. We were texted a picture of the technician (safety!) prior to the visit. I loved that. Ryan and Anthony were punctual, and did an excellent job cleaning the upholstery. We are very happy. Would use them again (…and again, and again).Highly recommend!!

Amanda A.

1705768873

This is easily the best rug cleaning service I've used, by a long shot. They not only do a fantastic job, but they are extremely professional and kind. They keep you updated on the process throughout, are easy to communicate with, and took great care of the antique rugs which are so special to me. They are candid about how they operate and make the entire process as easy as possible. Highly recommend!

Wayne

1701804821

Richard and Guy cleaned the front my house and and driveway today and I could not be more satisfied. They went above and beyond to make sure the affected area was completely cleaned.Thanks for the excellent service from these two employees.

Kim S.

1701635394

Excellent service & exceptional communication, from start to finish of the pick up/ cleaning/ treating/ drying process! Can’t recommend PEACE FROGS ENOUGH!

Rachel C.

1699034747

Had a great experience using Peace Frog for the first time today! Jeremy did a great job, was very personable, and showed great attention to detail when cleaning our rugs and couches. Will definitely use Peace Frog again for our carpet and upholstery cleaning needs.

kristen A.

1698844118

Evan came out yesterday to help clean out my dryer vent. He was amazing to work with, respected my home, gave me some tips and even let my two dogs say hello!Would highly recommend them for reasonable pricing and they were able to squeeze me in after a cancellation.

Erica K.

1698588875

Peace Frog cleaning has been my go to for professional carpet & upholstery cleaning needs for a few years. They never disappoint. Just had service this week, the tech Jeremy was amazing. During the cleaning the Tech advised me that we had a little accident. No worries, I appreciated the honesty. After he left, I noticed I had one other item that we had not realized was part of the incident. Ifthe item was low dollar I would have just moved on. I immediately reported the loss to their office. Within 45min of my report, the amazing front office & management had secured the facts of the incident and resolved the issue with a replacement order from the vendor of my damaged item. I am very appreciative of small business who appreciates the vale of customers. The service was great as usual and their resolution tactics was nothing less than exceptional.Your continued repeat customer 🤩

Ather Baig (.

1695912530

Lawton was on-time, professional and quick. Really happy with the results.

Marmon H.

1690394825

I’ve used Peace Frog multiple times - for carpet cleaning + rug cleaning + upholstery cleaning + power washing - and they’re easily the best, most professional, highest-quality company I’ve ever dealt with in relation to home work. And maybe ever. Ever. They’re that good. Do yourself a favor and use them! (And give Ryan + Lamont a bonus!).

Jennifer W.

1686181031

Absolutely stellar service. So impressed with Ben/ please send again next time and thank you so much! 5 star quality and service and value!Long time consistent user of peace frog. Highly recommend!

Johnny V

1685112451

I have 3 year old carpet that has been moderately abused by 2 dogs, 2 cats and a daughter who is quite messy with her makeup. After several pet stains, oil from pets coats, smeared makeup, and drink spills developed, I figured it was time for a carpet cleaning and began the process of vetting cleaning companies. From the 1st contact, Peace Frog really stood out from the other companies! While speaking with Justin McBride on the phone, he was thorough, listened well, friendly and pleasant. He repeated my concerns back to me and asked clarifying questions, it was a positive experience. They sent a rep to my house to evaluate the job and give a quote. I really appreciated this, because 2 other companies just gave an estimate over the phone without even knowing what the job entailed. Jason Schmidt, the technician who came to my house and gave a quote, explained their entire processes to me, was knowledgeable, friendly, and offered several solutions. He didn't try any "hard sell" tactics either (a different company tried this approach and it was very off putting). It was a good experience and a honest price, so I booked the carpet cleaning. Peace Frog sent over Jeremy McKnight, the carpet cleaning technician, and again I was taken back at how friendly and professional their employees were. Jeremy, asked great questions, showed that he listened to my concerns, was personable, and communicated everything extremely well! You can tell he really cares about his customers. He did an outstanding job lifting the stains from our carpet. The carpets look brand new, the house smells great, and we're all super satisfied with our experience in working with Peace Frog! You seriously cant go wrong with using them! Do yourself a favor, and book this company for your cleaning needs!

Amy K.

1683319379

We recently moved from out of state to the Austin area. Our rental home had beautiful hardwood floors, until you stepped onto them. They were not taken care of or cleaned properly in a long time. I contacted Peace Frog and they sent someone out the next day for an estimate. Jason was amazing. He took the time to talk to me and told me what process he would use to remove the built up grime. They got us in really fast, and even cleaned our kitchen tiles up! I highly recommend them for your flooring needs. Thank you Jason and Jeremy for a wonderful job!!

Chondra M

1683314625

Y’all, Ben got red wine out of my white sofa and light gray rug! The stain sat for two days until they could get here and there is not a trace of wine left on the sofa. I absolutely love Peace Frog and Ben!

Madison B.

1681752595

I never leave reviews but I really was blown away by the service I received this morning. I just had Jeremy out to my house to clean three carpeted rooms and the tile of one bathroom. He was on time, very thorough, helpful, kind - all the things you want when having someone do work in your home! Will definitely have Peace Frog back again!

Elizabeth W.

1681577009

Awesome service

1679414808

Jason, was great.professional and made sure I was happy with the work. We hired them to clean our offices, there was stains that had been there for more than 2 years and he managed to get them off. The carpet looks new ! Thanks so much Jason!
